VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Exchange relative to Aether Market?
SRP.A: Nova Exchange is {below} Aether Market in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Aether Market}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total home sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Echo Trade}.

VE.Q: What is Echo Trade's Home Sales in 1991?

VE.Q: What are the home sales of Aether Market, Echo Trade, and Nova Exchange in 1996?
VE.A: Aether Market's home sales is {3132.97} units/month, Echo Trade's home sales is {277.38} units/month, Nova Exchange's home sales is {623.29} units/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Home Sales in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum home sales is {10.00} units/month.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Home Sales in the area chart?

SC.Q: What is the average total Home Sales?
SC.A: The average total home sales is {3891.38} units/month.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Home Sales fall between 3486.72 and 3853.75 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Home Sales exceed 4156.01 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {4237.59} units/month in {1997}, {6017.68} units/month in {2002}, {4760.77} units/month in {1999}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Home Sales go below 3184.46 units/month? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: {3150.01} units/month in {1990}, {3070.61} units/month in {1986}, {3088.96} units/month in {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1999, was the average total Home Sales higher or lower than between 1991 and 1999?
NC.A: The average total home sales between 1985 and 1999 was {lower} than between 1991 and 1999.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1996, did the total Home Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 1991?
NC.A: The change in total home sales between 1987 and 1996 was {larger} than between 1990 and 1991.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1988 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1988 was {lower} than in 2001.

NC.Q: Was the total Home Sales in 1993 higher or lower than in 1999?
NC.A: The total home sales in 1993 was {lower} than in 1999.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Aether Market} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Echo Trade, Nova Exchange, Aether Market}.
